text:
*Shopify is hiring a Senior Content Marketing Manager, Campaigns* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

I'm looking for an experienced content marketer who can run marketing campaigns with me at Shopify. This includes understanding our SMB audience and market, building full-funnel content journeys for our priority topics, and reporting on and optimizing performance of content in campaigns. Bonus if you're already deep in the ecommerce world. Shopify is digital by default with core working hours between ~9-2pm PST (so ideally N.A. candidates).


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://smrtr.io/59bfJ>

<@URE5RKGNS>
